summary: This document contains account transaction details for the Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation Inc. at Deutsche Bank Wealth Management from January 3, 2017, to June 29, 2017. It includes various transactions such as cash disbursements, redemptions, and dividends, highlighting the financial activities associated with the foundation during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is associated with the Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation Inc. and is the primary individual linked to the account transactions detailed in this document.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for the Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation Inc. from January 3, 2017, to June 29, 2017.
Total market value of the account as of June 29, 2017, was $740,902.72.
Multiple transactions include cash disbursements and redemptions involving various corporate entities.
The document is marked as confidential and is subject to legal protections under federal rules.
There are several mentions of transactions involving Pfizer Inc. and Disney, indicating financial activities related to these companies.
